about.title: About Warm Heart
about.subtitle: Our story of compassion and service
about.missionText: Warm Heart is dedicated to creating positive change in communities through compassionate action and service. We believe in the power of kindness to transform lives and build stronger communities.
about.visionText: We envision a world where everyone has access to basic needs, education, and opportunities to thrive regardless of their circumstances.

valuesList.compassionText: We act with kindness and empathy in all our endeavors.
valuesList.integrityText: We maintain honesty and transparency in everything we do.
valuesList.inclusionText: We welcome and respect diversity in all its forms.
valuesList.commitmentText: We are dedicated to making lasting, positive change.

about.historyText: Disaster Relief & Community Development team since 1982 now operating under this mission-related name. Based and mostly functional in Lebanon but we also reach out globally wherever whenever!
